entry.title: [EU][VOIP] - Backend maintenance
entry.content:
Jan 17, 02:11 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 17, 00:59 UTC
Verifying - Update : The current maintenance has been completed but our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 17, 00:04 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams are still working on the maintenance which will take more time than expected. You can find below the new end time.
End time : 17/01/2023 01:00 UTC

Jan 16, 22:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 16, 17:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/01/2023 22:30 UTC
End time : 17/01/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : In addition to the impact generated by the main maintenance, some conference call functions may be degraded (mute, eject participants, etc.) but audio conferences will still be functional.
No expected impact on VOIP calls, CCS and Carrier SIP.
Related Maintenance : https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/h1qbgnmh0dr9
Service improvement : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance on its internal infrastructure to improve its reliability.

entry.content:
Jan 11, 11:05 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2023 21:30 UTC
End Time : 11/01/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : All websites are operational since 11/01 00:00 UTC
Root cause : [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage

Jan 11, 03:22 UTC
Update - The incident with vRacks is still open but there is significant progress since the last update.
Our technical teams remain working on the issue.

Jan 11, 00:42 UTC
Update - The issue with vRacks has been identified.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
We are checking the whole vRack infrastructure. Investigations are still ongoing.

Jan 10, 23:59 UTC
Update - The issue has been mitigated.
You may experienced some slowness.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue.

Jan 10, 23:12 UTC
Update - An incident has been open on Network & Infrastructure.
You can follow more update related to this issue here :
Related Incident : [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage

Jan 10, 23:03 UTC
Update - Further investigation reduced the scope of impact.
Our technical team are still working on it.

Jan 10, 22:56 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported multiple outage.
Our technical team are hand on issue.

Jan 10, 22:46 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/01/2023 21:30 UTC
